name: Ghost Insight: Emotions (5/9; 6/5)
description:
Ghost Insight:  Emotions is about a young  girl dealing with emotional instability. Watch her struggle with no rhyme or reason to  her feelings and the desperate struggle to come to terms with it. Connect with the crossed feelings that can come with trauma, and feel less alone in your own confusing emotions.  

Playtime:  10 minutes

TW:  Abuse
